name: Oh My Run! (Forrest)
description:
“My mom always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get. But I did not know about Cosmic Works. They always give us the best. "

We all have had the unstoppable desire to put on our sneakers and go running, running without a route or destination. Feel the breeze on your face, see a beautiful sunset or how the moon rises in the sky accompanied by the twinkling stars as you run, just run. Or not?

Join our intrepid and tireless runner for his long, long journey, because there is nothing better than running as if there were no tomorrow.

Dodge the obstacles you encounter along the way; jump boxes, rocks, slide under stubborn cows that block your way, be careful with suicidal birds and break the fences, that there are no barriers to the field.

With a careful 8bit retro aesthetic, both graphically and in sound, the game offers quality and entertainment in equal parts in short but exciting games. The small details introduced make it unique; changing atmosphere day / night, smooth and detailed animations, even grows the character's beard!

Run now! Run to be free! Run to be happy!
